data.title: Always solid
data.text: Great place with good beer (wish it was more frequently rotated). Come to watch a ufc fight on the tv or a fist fight at the bar!

data.title: Yummmmm
data.text: The food is delicious...great burger and talk about a friendly staff. The beer is cold, the wings were hot and fresh. I will DEFINITELY be going back soon.

data.title: Popular place
data.text:
Our group of friends visit this restaurant regularly.  The wings are the most popular item.  I myself have not tried them but everybody who has speaks highly of them.  They love the variety of preparation, grilled or breaded, etc.  I enjoy the blackened chicken quesadilla.  
Everybody in our group enjoys their food whatever they order.  The prices are very reasonable for both the wings and appetizers.

data.title: Great Food And Service
data.text:
Nice "Happy Hour" 4-7pm with awesome appetizers for around $5 and drink specials for around $3. Good selection of beers including locally brewed ones.

Friendly staff and not a bad spot to watch your favorite game or play a little free Texas Hold'em on a Sunday afternoon.

data.title: AMAZING DIVE
data.text: The best place around for great food, great beers and great service. Casual and comfy very friendly staff and patrons. The specials are always interesting and delicious. You want a great burger, look no further, great wings too.  I've tried almost everything on the menu and have never been disappointed. Seriously it all just Great Food. An amazing array of craft beers and the best bartenders with the expertise to make you a great mixed drink. The servers are always friendly, and professional always great service from an amazing staff. Plenty of TV's if you're into sports.  JUST GO YOU WON'T BE DISAPPOINTED.

data.title: Good food! Funky, casual atmosphere
data.text: Whenever my husband and I just want good simple food, very simple dress code and just hang out, we usually end up at Geronimo's. They have a good menu and I would recommend the pasta salad that comes with most of the items. It's very tasty and something different. They also serve fresh vegetables without all of the calories of butter, etc. if you are trying to be conscious of your diet.

data.title: What a Pleasant Surprise
data.text: We recently came to Geronimo's because a couple invited us to go with them.  It had been years since we had been here.  The array of beers available and the portions of the food was amazing.  We had the escargot and it was one of the best I have ever had.  The Gyro platter was huge.  The chicken was tender and juicy.  I was expecting "bar food" but came away knowing I could go here at any time and get a great meal.

data.title: Great place for a hamburger
data.text: I am not a sports bar person or beer drinking and that's what this place is but it also has one of the best hamburgers in the area. Big, juicy and very tasty. Also the chicken wings are big and meaty. All the food I've had there has been good and I have had no complaints.  The only problem I have with them is they are not open for lunch.  If you want a great hamburger or chicken wings and maybe some beer and watch some sports then this place is for you.

data.title: Great happy hour
data.text: The food is okay.  The happy hour is worth the price.  Otherwise its a big expensive and not worth the money.  The service is great.  People of all ranges from college to families and dress is very casual.

data.title: Cool Bar!!!
data.text: Went there after seeing an episode of Check Please SF. Loved the pasta salad ans shrimp. The food was great. Spot on. A hang out for college kids and adults too. Very cool place, quality food and drinks.

data.title: A bar with a surprise!
data.text: We’ve been to Geronimo’s dozens of times.  When you first enter, the atmosphere is definitely that of a bar.  However, the food is definitely NOT bar food.  Everything on the menu is good and the Chef has specials every weekend that are always delicious.  The food is reasonably priced.  Geronimo’s is a great place for a casual dinner.

data.title: Outstanding Bar Food In Davie
data.text:
You wouldn't expect to find gourmet quality food in your average bar. But, Geronimo's is a very happy exception. Their food is great!

My wife & I visited Geronimo's a few minutes before 5PM; just in time for their Happy Hour.

I took advantage of their 10 chicken wing Happy Hour special for just $6. For another $5.99 I ordered a dinner salad. 

Both the chicken and the salad were outstanding. They had a choice of at least half a dozen different styles to order the wings. I chose an excellent bar-b-que sauce. The salad was crisp, delicious and artfully prepared.

My wife ordered the same $5.99 salad but asked that they add some grilled salmon. This was just $5.00 more for a large and truly outstanding salmon fillet.

The portion sizes were very generous. So, each of us took home a portion of our entrees for lunch tomorrow.

We really appreciated Geronimo's flexibility and the great service provided by our waiter.

Geronimo's gets our wholehearted recommendation!

data.title: Great college and locals bar
data.text:
This is one of the best hole in the wall bars in South Florida. They are always open late, bartenders are friendly and the beer is always fresh.

We had a few beers, a cheesesteak sandwich and some wings. Everything was delicious. Don't expect anything fancy. It's just a cool place to hang out.

data.title: All around great place!
data.text: Whether you want a great place to watch a UFC fight or sports event, happy hour or catching up with an old friend, this is a great place to go. It is also super family friendly if you're bringing the kiddos along. They have great food selections and an awesome staff. The bar offers an expansive selection of beers and they can mix up just about any drink you can think of. Their grilled chicken wings and Philly Pretzel Sliders are some of our family favs.

data.title: Beer, Spirits, and Food
data.text: This is essentially a bar that happens to have EXCELLENT food.  My husband and I visit here quite often and the chef always has a special that doesn't disappoint.  We love to escape here from the daily grind.  Relax.  Have beer or cocktail.  Order some food.  Play darts.  Very friendly staff who are happy to serve us every time we visit.

data.title: Excellent service, average food
data.text: Being a local I used to go here often. Happy hour is great. I get my usual waitress, brings me drinks on time, great! As far as food, the owner never changes the menu, so we come here less and less, because we are tired of eating the same old stuff, year after year. Boring.

data.title: Very Good Food With Terrible Service
data.text:
We went last night as a group of six at 6:30 so we could get happy hour prices which last until 7. We told the "hostess"( clueless, more like it) we has reservations and gave our name. She looked at the board and saw the name there and then sat 3 other couples before us. When we pointed to a hightop table with 6 chairs, she said it was reserved for a group. Again we were the only group of 6 on her "board" and we again had to tell her we were that group. She then started arguing with us that we wanted a table not a hightop. (meanwhile the happy hour was running out!) 

She finally sat us at the stupid hightop and left, 10 minutes later no server had stopped by or even acknowledged our presence. So now there is 10 minutes left on the Happy hour clock when a server finally meanders over to get our drinks. 

So the service is seriously lacking in a big way but it's not affecting the bottom line here as there were a lot of people out enjoying their Friday night . That also might be because of the food, which is a big step up from your typical bar food. 

The fish and chips were basic but are very large portions, the Tuna sliders special was especially delicious, the Chicken Goat Cheese salad very good and was enough for two, the salmon was a moist well sized filet and the wings were enjoyed. 

And if you are into Craft Beers this place has you covered as they have too many to name. 

Hint: Go with a group you enjoy chatting with because you will definitely have plenty of time to talk and order everything you want right away since the chances of seeing the server again are slim to none.

data.title: One Major Fault
data.text: The food is excellent and they have a wide choice of beers to suit most tastes. They even have one TV channel dedicated to news which I appreciate. Happy hour is until 7pm and some appetizers and draught beers are included. I have enjoyed visiting this restaurant many times, but sadly, no more. They allow smoking inside - I refer to the E Cigarettes which produce huge volumes of visible smoke and smell awful depending upon what the smoker chooses to add to them. I have found over the last two weeks that this affects my health and that of my wife so we say goodbye to Geronimos.

data.title: Casual Dining; Good Food
data.text: We went during happy hour.  Many of the appetizers are $5.00 and are very good.  I especially like the chicken tenders with fries.  The portion is pretty big and for $5 it is a great deal. The burgers are good; not greasy but very tasty.  The service was good at the bar.  It is a very casual place and I find it to be relaxing and fun for a bite to eat.  They do not open until 4 pm during the week.  They do have happy hour on weekends in addition to their weekday happy hour and they are open during the day on the weekends.  I definitely recommend Geronimo's for a fun meal.

data.title: Poor!
data.text: The service was good and the staff was attentive.  That is all i can say that was good.  I ordered a burger well-done, it came to the table rare.  The ceiling was dirty and falling down. The ceiling fans were full of dust and trailing cobwebs behind the blades.  My wife dropped her cell phone on the floor, and I went under the table to retrieve it; the floor was filthy!!  There were old napkins and empty cleaning supply bottles on the floor, under the table.  I would not give my wife her phone back until I had cleaned it with an antiseptic.  Will I ever go back there?  Never...  I value my health too much to be exposed to the filth.
